actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

official_title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions classified to chapters 44, 45, 46, and 47 of title 50, United States Code.

summary.text:
This bill makes technical amendments to statutory references to title 50 (War and National Defense) of the U.S. Code, especially with respect to:

 national security, miscellaneous intelligence community authorities, the Central Intelligence Agency, and the National Security Agency.

titles.title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions classified to chapters 44, 45, 46, and 47 of title 50, United States Code.
